Name: Spacey Vade
About the game: Challenging emergent arcade shooting fun! Plan, time and bounce your shots, how large a combo you can score with a single shot. Can you 100% and 3 star each level? Itâ€™s not as easy as you think! With every pixel in each level a dynamic physics object, the emergent possibilities for each level are endless. Features: Synth-wave glitch styling 42 challenging puzzle, wave and boss levels 100% pixel physics 100% real gameplay Space unicorn that poops mines Local high scores Designed to be played on restored arcade cabinets
